name: Publicly Accessible Azure PostgreSQL Flexible Servers with no/old TLS
query: { postgreSqlFlexibleServers (where: { AND: [ { publicAccessBlocked: false } { firewallRules_SOME: { startIPAddress: "0.0.0.0" endIPAddress: "255.255.255.255" } } { OR: [ {tlsStatus: "disabled"} {tlsMinimumVersion: 0} {tlsMinimumVersion: 1} {tlsMinimumVersion: 1.100000023841858} ] } ] }) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory } }
